english.segment1: someone please save us, us college kids!. what my parents told me is what i did. they said go to school and be a college kid. but in the end i question why i did
english.segment2: i'm poor, i'm starving, i'm flat broke, i've got no cash to spend. sell all my books for front row tickets to dave matthews band. my girlfriend's at another school, i know this year will test her. i called, found out she had three other boyfriends last semester
english.segment3: and that's why i say. oh no! not for me, not for me. call it torture, call it university. no! arts and crafts is all i need. i'll take calligraphy and then i'll make a fake degree
english.segment4: 80 grand later i found out that all that i had learned. is that you should show up to take your finals and your midterms. the party scene is kinda mean, i think it's sick and twisted. the navy showed up at my dorm and claimed that i enlisted
english.segment5: and that's why i say. oh no! not for me, not for me. call it torture, call it university. no! arts and crafts is all i need. i'll take calligraphy and then i'll make a fake degree
english.segment6: don't get excited. she'll say "no" without a doubt you see. and i've decided college girls just won't go out with me. they make me nervous and they always catch me off my guard. like cell phone services i drop out cause college is too hard
english.segment7: it's time to call my father. cause it's his alma mater. good grades aren't what they seem. i think he knows the dean. it's time to call my father. cause it's his alma mater. he says he's proud of me. but college always was his dream. and i would always say it's not for me
english.segment8: oh no! not for me, not for me. call it torture, call it university. no! arts and crafts is all i need. i'll take calligraphy and then i'll make a fake degree
english.segment9: someone please save us, us college kids!. what my parents told me is what i did. they said go to school and be a college kid. but in the end i question why i did
english.segment10: do what will make you happy. do what you feel is right. only but one thing matters. learn how to live your life
english.segment11: [in background:]. (phi, beta, delta, cappa. someone please save us, us college kids!. what my parents told me is what i did. they said go to school and be a college kid. but in the end i question why i did)
english.segment12: do what will make God happy. do what you feel is right. only but one thing matters. learn how to live your life
